headline: Air Products Delivers $1.79: What This Dividend Giant’s Payout Says About Its Future
summary: Air Products & Chemicals (APD) just delivered its $1.79 per share quarterly dividend on February 9, 2026, marking another milestone in a streak that few industrial companies can match. With 44 consecutive years of dividend increases, APD has earned its Dividend Aristocrat status, but the latest payment arrives against a backdrop of mounting operational pressures ... Air Products Delivers $1.79: What This Dividend Giant’s Payout Says About Its Future

headline: BASF Strengthens Business Services Through Global Hub Setup
summary: BASF advances its Global Business Services overhaul with a new India hub to boost efficiency, resilience and scalable support worldwide.
